alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 9:06PM CDT until September 19 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL OKLAHOMA...NORTHERN CLEVELAND AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 905 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Norman, or 5 miles north of Goldsby, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eastern Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Choctaw, Noble, Spencer, Nicoma Park, Goldsby, Valley Brook, Stella, Tinker Air Force Base, Stanley Draper Lake, Lake Thunderbird, Smith Village, and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
